title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
On Tom Brady's 45th birthday Colin gives him the gift of pointing out his remarkable achievements in the NFL only since turning 40. He pays tribute to the great broadcaster Vin Scully who passed away at the age of 94. He also talks to Nick Wright from First Things First about the Dolphins punishment for tampering and why the 49ers will be successful with young QB Trey Lance. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
